name: The Ethereal Light
description:
The Ethereal Light:
Venture through a short dungeon and take on monsters in order to bring your ethereal light to the end of the dungeon in this action adventure game! This was built as a school assignment and acts as a prototype for future endeavors. 

Thank you, 
Darksparky


Asset Packages Used:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/polygon-dungeons-pack-102677
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/polygon-dungeons-map-143026
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/polygon-fantasy-kingdom-164532 (Only the fog and the sunbeams are used from this pack...Though I certainly plan on making something much bigger with this ;-)  )
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/polygon-fantasy-rivals-118399
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/basic-motions-free-pack-154271
and several free animations from https://www.mixamo.com/

Note: 
While this is a school project, I do not intend to entirely abandon it, and plan on building something more from it, in some form or another, at sometime in the future.
